entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
